title: Prenatal Comfort Massage
description: Soothing, side-lying massage tailored to support comfort, circulation, and rest during pregnancy.

title: Firm and True
description: A medium-to-firm pressure therapeutic session designed for clients who benefit from deeper muscle work to address chronic tension. Focused on relieving tight areas while maintaining comfort and professional care.

title: Gentle and Poetic Swedish
description: A nurturing, light-touch session created for clients who require minimal pressure due to medical concerns, physical sensitivity, or recovery needs. Ideal for promoting relaxation, comfort, and gentle nervous system support.

title: Signature Sensory Massage
description: A sensory-based therapeutic experience designed for clients who enjoy entering deep meditative states during bodywork. Sound elements, tuning forks, and Himalayan warm salt stones are incorporated to support focused awareness and nervous system regulation. This session may create a gentle sense of anticipation and heightened presence rather than simple relaxation.

title: Still Waters Reset (Lymphatic)
description: A gentle lymphatic-focused massage designed to support circulation, lymphatic movement, and natural detox pathways. This light-touch session is ideal for clients seeking swelling reduction, immune system support, and deep nervous system calming.

title: ZEN Shiatsu
description: Meridian balancing with full-body rocking and compressions. (Fully clothed — wear soft, comfortable clothing)
